quote_first: ''I’ll take the coffee tray out,'' I suggest humbly. As I pick it up I glance again at my watch.
quote_last: . I wonder if they’ve started the meeting.
title: The Undomestic Goddess
author: Sophie Kinsella

quote_first: He stood up once, early on, to lock his office door, and then he was reading the last page, and it was exactly
quote_last: , and the sun beating on his office windows was a different sun from the one he’d always known.
title: Freedom
author: Jonathan Franzen
